general.ghost: @%%USER%% I do not see you in the room! Try again in a few moments.
general.userNotFound: @%%USER%% I did not find the requested user!
general.notLocated: @%%USER%% I did not find this user!
general.insParams: @%%USER%% Insufficient or invalid parameters! Check the bot documentation.

dc.notDisc: [DC] @%%USER%% I did not see this user logging out!
dc.tooLong: [DC] @%%USER%% You logged out a long time ago (%%TIME%%) in position %%POSITION%%!
dc.tooLongBooth: [DC] @%%USER%% You logged out a long time ago (%%TIME%%) In the DJ booth!
dc.tooTimeElap: [DC] @%%USER%% You've disconnected there. %%TIME%% In the DJ booth, but his video was played by over %%PERC%%% Of the total duration!
dc.discBooth: [DC] @%%USER%% You've disconnected there. %%TIME%% In the DJ booth after running %%PERC%% Of your video
dc.alrDis: [DCconfig] @%%USER%% The DC query is already disabled
dc.modUnlockedWL: [DC] @%%USER%% Take your filthy hand off that button over there and let me work in peace

eta.alrAct: [ETA] @%%USER%% The ETA query is already activated
eta.alrDis: [ETA] @%%USER%% The ETA query is already disabled

skip.noDJ: [skip] @%%USER%% There is no DJ to jump!

swap.notInWL: [swap] @%%USER%% Both users need to be queued!

emotelimit.value: [emotelimit] @%%USER%% Limit of emotes per message set: %%LIMIT%%
emotelimit.emotelimit: [emotelimit] @%%USER%% Limit of emotes per message set: %%LIMIT%%

medialimit.invalidLimit: [medialimit] @%%USER%% Lifetime limit must be greater than or equal to zero!
medialimit.lockskip: [medialimit] @%%USER%% The DJ will be skipped and moved to the position %%POS%% From the queue.
medialimit.siDisabled: [medialimit] @%%USER%% The video will skip when it reaches the set time limit.
medialimit.siEnabled: [medialimit] @%%USER%% The video will jump immediately if it exceeds the defined limit.
medialimit.skip: [medialimit] @%%USER%% Your video / music exceeds the time limit of %%TIME%% and will be skipped immediately!
medialimit.skipAfterLimit: [medialimit] @%%USER%% Your video / music exceeds the timeout of %%TIME%% and will be skipped after that time!

autoskip.time: [autoskip] @%%USER%% The DJ will be skipped after %%TIME%% Seconds from end of video!

lockskip.noDJ: [lockskip] @%%USER%% There is no DJ to jump!
lockskip.skip: [lockskip] %%USER%% Jumped the current DJ and moved him to the position %%POS%%

songinfo.notLoaded: [songinfo] @%%USER%% No information about the current item.
songinfo.statsSC: [songinfo] %%USER%% it's playing: %%NAME%% (Reproductions: %%PLAY%%, :star:: %%STARS%%, genre: %%GENRE%%, downloads: %%DL%%, uplouded: %%UPLOADED%%, duration: %%DUR%%)
songinfo.shorterDuration: [songinfo] %%USER%% is playing a song that has a duration less than the original (%%PLUGTIME%%, %%SOURCETIME%%). As a consequence, it will not be played in full.
songinfo.longerDuration: [songinfo] %%USER%% is playing a song that has a longer duration than the original (%%PLUGTIME%%, %%SOURCETIME%%), as a result, will be skipped after the actual duration.
songinfo.infoFailed: [songinfo] failed to get current song information.
songinfo.notFound: [songinfo] @ %%USER%% video / private or unavailable music, you will be skipped and moved to %%POS%% in the queue!
songinfo.coutryUnavaliable: [songinfo] @%%USER%% video can not be played in this country, you will be skipped and moved to %%POS%% in the queue!
songinfo.embedDisabled: [songinfo] @%%USER%% This video can only be viewed on the youtube site, you will be jumped and moved to %%POS%% in the queue!

clearchat.clearUser: [clearchat] @%%USER%% Clearing the chat from %%TARGET%%, please wait...

historycheck.songInHistory: [historycheck] @%%USER%% Item in history (%%HPOS%%/%%HLEN%%), rang %%HMPLAY%% Times (being %%HMUPLAY%% Times by %%USER%%), última há %%TIME%% por %%LASTUSER%%

afkremoval.warn1: [afkremoval] @ %% USER %% a lot of time has passed and I did not see you interacting with the room.Please say something in the chat in the next few minutes or I'll remove you from the waiting list.
afkremoval.warn2: [afkremoval] @ %% USER %% Last Warning: Please chat something in the next few minutes or I'll remove you from the waiting list.
[afkremoval] @ %% USER %% Removing you from the inactivity waiting list. It's no use crying.

roullete.lotteryWinner: [roullete] @%%USER%% you won on the automatic rollette and will be moved to first! @djs attentive, the next will be chosen in 1 hour!
roullete.ppWinner: [pproullete] @%%USER%% you were the lucky guy who won a PP heap of someone! Stay in wait to receive the prize!
roullete.noUsers: [pproullete] @staff something wrong happened, I could not find lucky for the automatic draw ...
